channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to design a Mediterranean garden for Darrel and Michelle, inspired by childhood memories of time spent in Cyprus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Debra from Wigan wants her plot to be transformed into a calming zen garden for relaxation and contemplation. For ?6,000, can Charlie and Lee bring her vision to life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Farmers Country Showdown
channel.desc: Hardworking families across the UK compete to win the much-coveted title of best farming family business at the British Farming Awards.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives married couple Colin and Wendy, who team up with Jane, the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Porthmadog. Can they get past their clashing visions to make a profit on it.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: The team rush to complete the animal rescue centre makeover. An old wine rack is revived in the Tool Bus. And a rundown garden gets some TLC.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
channel.desc: Bill samples the laid-back red-dirt lifestyle, goes swimming with friendly whale sharks and visits the awesome Pink Lakes. There are also wild emus - and they're hungry.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard journeys down the beautiful River Test. He discovers why this rare chalk stream is so important and how it's threatened by pollution.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives married couple Colin and Wendy, who team up with Jane, the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Porthmadog. Can they get past their clashing visions to make a profit on it.

channel.desc: Debra from Wigan wants her plot to be transformed into a calming zen garden for relaxation and contemplation. For ?6,000, can Charlie and Lee bring her vision to life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Alice explores the flourishing world of sex and wellness, from a full-body orgasm workshop to an intimate yoni massage . Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruel Passion
channel.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Strip Poker
channel.desc: Man-about-town John Carter is implicated in the murder of a woman from a nightclub. With gangsters strong-arming him, can he escape from seedy Soho? Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Boatyards On the Thames
channel.desc: An oral history of Boatyards on the tidal Thames as told by boat builders and boatyard owners. Produced by Digital Works.

channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives married couple Colin and Wendy, who team up with Jane, the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Porthmadog. Can they get past their clashing visions to make a profit on it.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Charlie are in Luton to create a cottage garden for Kim, who has a compact plot and a far-flung family.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Bolton to create a south east Asian-inspired, wildlife-friendly garden for Debbie with a relaxing space for yoga.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Two archaeologists and a historian try Edwardian life for a year. They prepare for the arrival of their first livestock, and historian Ruth Goodman cooks a sheep's head stew.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team branch out into market gardening, all-year-round egg production and beef cattle.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team get to grips with the revolutionary technologies of the age.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team leave the farm in search of work and head to the coast to reap the ocean's bounty.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Doomwatch
channel.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex With The Stars
channel.desc: A shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by having affairs with a woman from each star sign then writing about it. Contains sex scenes and 80s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Permissive
channel.desc: Bad girls don't come to London, they're made in London. Suzy, a young country girl, is led astray by the wild members of a rock group. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Clinic
channel.desc: British thriller. Julie sells sexual favours to male clients at her health farm then blackmails them. Starring Georgina Ward and written by Hazel Adair. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Brewing Stories
channel.desc: A history of the three breweries on the banks of the Thames in London, with amazing stories and first hand accounts of people that worked in them.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Aylesbury to design a traditional courtyard garden with a Turkish twist to remind Elaine and Kevin of their time spent living abroad.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Exeter to transform a tumbledown, unloved back garden into a chilled-out, festival-inspired retreat for Dan and Amy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Right To Roam
channel.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard explores the wilds of Scotland as he journeys down the River Clyde, in search of clawed alien invertebrates and other elusive species, and learns about the impact the Clyde has had globally.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard discovers the River Derwent's historical importance, as he journeys from the Derbyshire Peaks to Derby, the home of Rolls-Royce. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Stick Up
channel.desc: In this period caper, set in 1930s England, romance blooms between two very different people, an American thief and an Irish woman.

channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: Across the country, Alice explores what sex means for modern Brits: pleasure, money, something spiritual? Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Sex Thief
channel.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Doomwatch
channel.desc: Scientists investigate a remote island plagued by mutations caused by toxic waste, uncovering a disturbing government cover-up.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK

channel.desc: Stories of migration to South West London 1948-71 with stories from Windrush era onwards.
